title: Business Practical Competency Enhancement: IMS Learning Design-Based eLearning System Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core components of the IMS Learning Design standard.
Learners can design an e-learning system applying a three-tier Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA) model.
Learners can apply methods to separate learning design from web services via BPEL process execution in real-world cases.
Learners can document mathematical problem-solving processes with over 80% accuracy through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
